SELECT quo.*,#{surveyorId} AS surveyor_id,1 AS `type` FROM t_quotation quo WHERE quo.end_date >=(select date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) and quo.quotation_status !=0 and quo.del_flag=0 and (quo.specified_id is null or quo.specified_id =#{surveyorId}) ORDER BY quo.update_date desc limit #{start},#{length}
